title: AI Meets Brain: Memory Systems from Cognitive Neuroscience to Autonomous Agents
summary: Memory serves as the pivotal nexus bridging past and future, providing both humans and AI systems with invaluable concepts and experience to navigate complex tasks. Recent research on autonomous agents has increasingly focused on designing efficient memory workflows by drawing on cognitive neuroscience.
